title: Electrocatalytic nitrogen cycle: mechanism, materials, and momentum
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03156C, Review Article
Laiquan Li, Linyuan Xu, Hanyun Wang, Haohong Wei, Cheng Tang, Guisheng Li, Yuhai Dou, Huakun Liu, Shi Xue Dou
Artificial nitrogen fixation has been pivotal in escalating agricultural productivity and sustaining exponential human population growth. Nonetheless, these practices have concurrently perturbed the natural nitrogen cycle, engendering a plethora of...
